svg.text: Global AI Job Market & Salary Trends 2025
Comprehensive Analysis for Career Planning and Market Insights
Top skills demanded across AI positions
Most common AI roles in the market
Typical progression from entry to executive level
Python remains the most demanded skill (85% of positions), followed by machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.
Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) are increasingly important with 70% of roles requiring cloud experience.
Nordic countries (Denmark, Sweden) offer the highest average salaries, while Asia-Pacific regions show strong growth in AI job opportunities.
Remote work adoption varies significantly by region, with Sweden leading at 85%.
The AI field shows clear career progression with salary increases of 40-60% between levels. Senior and Executive roles often require 7+ years of experience
and specialized domain knowledge. Entry-level positions focus on foundational skills.
